title: Transformers: One Prime Changer Bumblebee (B-127) Action Figure
seller_info_text: Sold by Amazon Resale and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: FILM-INSPIRED 2-IN-1 CONVERTING TRANSFORMERS TOY: inspired by the Transformers: One film, this Bumblebee/B-127 Transformers action figure converts from robot to Cybertronian car mode for amazing 2-in-1 play
2 ICONIC MODES: this Transformers figure can change from a robot toy into a Cybertronian car toy in 15 steps

12.5-CM ROBOT ACTION FIGURE: in robot mode, Bumblebee/B-127 action figure is 12.5 cm (5 inches) tall. Stage battles from the film with other Transformers toys like this one! (Each sold separately, subject to availability)
CYBERTRONIAN CAR MODE: imagine epic battle scenes with this Transformers figure in Cybertronian car mode! Great for children who love toy cars, toy lorries and other vehicle toys
AMAZING ACCESSORIES: includes a battle sword accessory that attaches to the figure’s arm in robot mode and an energy sphere
description: From the manufacturer Prime Changer Bumblebee/B-127 This 12.5-cm Bumblebee/B-127 converting action figure is based on the character from the Transformers: One film. Two ways to play Convert this action figure between robot mode and Cybertronian car mode in 15 steps. Amazing accessories Attach the battle sword accessory in robot mode to imagine exciting battles! Also comes with an energy sphere. Inspired by Transformers: One Transformers One is the untold origin story of Optimus Prime and Megatron, once friends bonded like brothers, who changed the fate of Cybertron forever.

specifications_table.Radio Control Suitability: ‎imaginative play, role-playing as Transformers characters, collecting
